actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. _Hit:_ 6 (1d8+2) piercing damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 12). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the crocodile can't Bite another target.

bonus_actions.name: Death Roll
bonus_actions.desc: One creature grappled by the crocodile must make a DC 12 STR save, taking 5 (2d4) slashing damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

special_abilities.name: Hold Breath
special_abilities.desc: The crocodile can hold its breath for 15 minutes.
